songs.title: 17 Miles
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Bravo]
Don’t tell me that you love me
I’m runnin’ for my life yup
And imma let you down let you down every time you try and open up
You can tell me that you want me
We all have our desires
So I’ll give you my time for the night but I might, be gone when you wake up


[Chorus: Bravo & Kira Kosarin]
I’m runnin’ from your love
Will it ever be enough?
It’s an ugly conversation don’t know where we’re s’posed to go
17 miles headed down the same road
I’m runnin’ from your love

[Verse 2: Kira Kosarin]
Don’t tell me that you love me
I gotta run my life, yup
& I can’t hold you down, cuz I fear that in time you’re gonna get me stuck
You can tell me that you want me
I’m staring at the fire
So imma put it out with the tears in my eyes
Before it burns me up


[Chorus: Bravo & Kira Kosarin]
I’m runnin’ from your love
Will it ever be enough?
It’s an ugly conversation don’t know where we’re s’posed to go
17 miles headed down the same road
I’m runnin’ from your love
